name: Infinite Punch
description:
Please note. This app contains ads.

Be the best fighter in the world!

🥊 Immerse yourself in the adrenaline rush of infinite punches and try not to miss a single time. 
💪 Hone your skills to break your record and defeat more enemies! 
✈️ Travel through different levels to discover new enemies! 
🏆 Be the very best! Unlock all achievements and conquer the leaderboards! 

Enjoy a game with awesome graphics and great music with all the power of your taps!
